channel.title: BattleSoft Released l Summoning,Legit dungeoneering,Large,Minigames + MORE
channel.description:
Hey there. ******** Here you can download Client and Source: http://uppit.com/pqdrax8xh2h2/BattleSoft_Package.rar
And heres our advertising page:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2cza453.png[/img]
Some of the features we got:
Buy 500 so it makes shopping quicker and easier. VPS = 24/7 Online, no laggs + no bugs. 100% Void knights + Elite void knights + Deflector! GO PEST CONTROL! Torva, Virtus and Pernix 100% effects. Slayer Helms are working! And boosts slayer XP! Better skills than other Project Insanity's Legit remade PvP + PvM. Loads of NPC Teleporters Fullscreen Mode Legit Slayer points + Pk points store. Legit Hybridding Rezisable Mode Casting boosts (Arcane, SoL etc...) Gameframe changing mode. Superlarge server. Most of dungeons are working real way. + Most of the real rs spawns are on real locations. (Sp) (or) Making added! Slayer Ring 100% working + effects. Miniquests Ship Travelling Glory Teleporting Games Necklace Teleporting Instant itemswitching. Superfast. DICING More places to go! Ring of Duelling teleporting 100% Sled. Lol. *HOW TO MAKE MONEY* Probably quickest way of getting money is: Kill Yak. (Located in lumbridge) Pick up magic whistle, you will see shopkeeper near of Yaks, Sell it for 53002gp Each! Thieving PvM PvP All skills Random events Miniquests.
PROTECTIONS DOS Protected "null" protected. Crashing protected.
[Pictures] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/25z733r.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/53to2o.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/143giop.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mfn88m.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/ivioh5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/21b63j7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/d4dc7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2edwbq0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qw32mq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/bwpwj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/24p001y.jpg[/img]
Client and Server: http://uppit.com/pqdrax8xh2h2/BattleSoft_Package.rar

item.title: BattleSoft Released l Summoning,Legit dungeoneering,Large,Minigames + MORE
item.dc:creator: @The_Owner_CJ The Owner CJ
item.description:
@The_Owner_CJ wrote:

BattleSoftz:

Most of dungeons are working real way. + Most of the real rs spawns are on real locations.

May I emphasize the “real way” part. Having them not in the spot like real runescape, and having a custom dungeoneering place is not real. Why waste everyone’s time with false advertising, to be honest it pisses me off a lot and im sure it does for everyone else too.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleSoft Released l Summoning,Legit dungeoneering,Large,Minigames + MORE
item.dc:creator: @coolguy12123 coolguy12123
item.description:
@coolguy12123 wrote:

[quote=“austin cadle, post:25, topic:414282”][quote author=coolguy12123 link=topic=516246.msg3748562#msg3748562 date=1315865126]

Dude wtf???

Ok here is a HUGE problem. When I edited the ‘runserver’ batch file, it is on jdk version 1.7.0, and i changed it to 1.6_26 and it gave me lots of fucking errors. Same as the compiler. What to do?

[/quote]
The only reason i will help u is ur my friend so listen open up compiler and run notice it says D: replace that with C: and your JDK version then compile, run enjoy
Also I’m using this as a base for my ultimate project going to have 100-150 shops, economy based etc.
Also a custom skill - Collector![/quote]

Thank you 1000 times! You, my bud, helped me a lot. You deserve a big medal for participating and being very active. Thank you!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

[quote=“coolguy12123, post:24, topic:414282”][quote author=coolguy12123 link=topic=516246.msg3748548#msg3748548 date=1315864740]
Dude wtf???

Ok here is a HUGE problem. When I edited the ‘runserver’ batch file, it is on jdk version 1.7.0, and i changed it to 1.6_26 and it gave me lots of fucking errors. Same as the compiler. What to do?
[/quote][/quote]
The only reason i will help u is ur my friend so listen open up compiler and run notice it says D: replace that with C: and your JDK version then compile, run enjoy
Also I’m using this as a base for my ultimate project going to have 100-150 shops, economy based etc.
Also a custom skill - Collector!

item.title: BattleSoft Released l Summoning,Legit dungeoneering,Large,Minigames + MORE
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

[quote=“InsidiaX, post:12, topic:414282”]Yeah, thanks for changing coords and re-releasing my server (y) :|[/quote]That’s what I was thinking, This is InsidiaX, Just new areas. Now, my opinion, This should be taken down, All you did was re-release another server, If InsidiaX didn’t give you permission, you have no right to re-post this. Also, honestly, InsidiaX is better because of the original areas, the new areas that you chose to use aren’t all that good looking. Next time you want to do some “Minor” edits, be sure to get permission from the real developer to re-post anything that you edit.

Read full topic
